instructions: Open Bixby Home by either pressing the Bixby key on your phone or swiping right. Scroll down the page to find the Bixby Vision card, and tap Image . Point the camera at the object. Bixby Vision attempts to identify the object and displays suggestions. Tap the suggestion that matches what you re looking for, and Bixby Vision opens a list of matches. Tap an image and your default web browser opens to display the search results. View the web page to find information about your photo.
